featured.text: First of all, the gases used in bug bombs are highly flammable and thus pose a serious risk of fire or explosion if the product is not used properly.

definition.zh_def: 易燃的，容易被點燃或燃燒的。
definition.en_def: Capable of being easily ignited and of burning quickly.
definition.example: The materials used in the construction are highly flammable.
